. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick says in a to-be-released statement.'' Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible.'' Michael Vick
